features: High Impact White Teeth Whitening Mouthwash
Actively Whitens Teeth and WhiteSeal Technology Helps to Prevent Future Stains
Kills Bad Breath Germs and Bacteria
body.description: Colgate Optic White High Impact White whitening mouthwash contains 2% hydrogen peroxide to effectively whiten teeth by removing surface stains. This alcohol free mouthwash doesn't contain ethanol, so there's no burn. This mouthwash is an Icy Fresh Mint flavor that helps freshen breath while whitening teeth. It even contains Whiteseal technology to help seal out and prevent stains. For an extra white smile, use after brushing with Colgate Optic White toothbrushes and toothpastes.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Colgate Optic White Mouthwash Colgate Optic White Mouthwash is an alcohol-free, enamel-safe whitening mouthwash that not only freshens breath, but actively whitens teeth, and seals out new stains. Its effective hydrogen peroxide formula helps remove surface stains and helps to prevent new stains between brushings.
For great whitening results, use this teeth whitening mouthwash with Colgate 360 Optic White toothbrush and with Optic White Toothpaste.

Colgate Total 12HR Protection Colgate Total Gum Health Colgate Optic White Colgate Enamel Health Colgate Peroxyl Colgate Ortho Defense (Phos-Flur) Product Colgate Total Peppermint/Colgate Total Spearmint Mouthwash Colgate Total Gum Health Mouthwash Colgate Optic White Advanced Whitening Mouthwash Colgate Enamel Health Mouthwash Colgate Peroxyl Mouthwash Colgate Ortho Mouthwash Benefit 12HR protection against germs, even after eating and drinking. Clinically proven to help reverse gingivitis in 6 weeks- Fights plaque bacteria between teeth along the gum line. Actively whitens and seals out new stains by removing surface stains and helps to prevent new stains between brushing. Strengthens enamel even where brush may miss. Helps replenish natural calcium back into enamel. Cleans and promotes healing on minor oral wounds. Helps promote healing of mouth sores, irritations and mouth burns. Ideal protection while wearing braces. Reduces white spots.

reviews.reviewText: This is a great product and is used daily at our house. Great price also.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I received this order very promptly. I use the Optic Whitening mouthwash daily after flossing and brushing with an advanced whitening toothpaste. Since starting it, I (and others) have noticed my smile is much brighter and whiter! I am a heavy coffee drinker so I am grateful for any improvement! I will continue to purchase as this has quickly become a new favorite in my daily health and beauty routine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My favorite mouthwash, hands-down! It cleans, leaves your mouth feeling clean and fresh, and it definitely whitens!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Turn Your Mouth into a Winter Wonderland Minus the Snow
reviews.reviewText: Ah, the eternal quest for pearly whites – a journey fraught with the peril of coffee stains, the dreaded wine tint, and let's not forget, those treacherous beetroot assaults. Enter the knight in shining armor: Colgate Optic White Whitening Mouthwash, armed with its trusty steed, 2% hydrogen peroxide, and a cloak of fresh mint scent. I embarked on this adventure with a trio of bottles, each promising a land of dental dazzle. Here's the scoop, sprinkled with a bit of minty fresh humor:Taste and Sensation:Imagine gargling with a cloud (if clouds were minty and slightly fizzy), and you've got the first swish of this mouthwash. It's like hosting a rave in your mouth, where the dress code strictly says "whitening casual." The fresh mint isn't just fresh; it's "just brushed your teeth and stepped into a winter breeze" fresh. However, brace yourself for the tingling sensation – it's the hydrogen peroxide's way of saying, "I'm working here!"Whitening Wizardry:The magic ingredient, 2% hydrogen peroxide, is basically a fairy godmother for your teeth, but instead of turning pumpkins into carriages, it turns tea stains into tales of brightness. After a few weeks, my teeth started to reflect my screen's brightness back at me. Not quite blinding passersby, but let's just say I've been smiling at my reflection more often (and not just because I love my smile).Bottle Battle:A three-pack means you're stocked up for a good while. It's like preparing for a winter hibernation, but instead of food, you're stockpiling teeth whiteness. The 32-ounce size is generous, ensuring you won't run out mid-gargle. Plus, having three bottles reduces the chances of the dreaded "empty bottle" morning surprise.Pros:A minty taste that could double as a breath freshener for a yeti.Whitening effects that make your teeth so bright, you might need sunglasses.A liquid entourage in a three-pack, ensuring long-term commitment to dental dazzle.Cons:The tingling sensation might have you wondering if your mouth joined a gym without telling you.Not suitable for coffee-addicted vampires looking to maintain their gothic aesthetic.Final Guffaws:Colgate Optic White Whitening Mouthwash promises a fresher breath and whiter teeth, and it delivers – with a side of laughter if you're into the tingling sensation. It's like having a mini spa day for your teeth, minus the cucumber slices.Recommendation:If you're eager to blind your friends with your smile or simply enjoy the sensation of a minty fresh blizzard in your mouth each morning, this mouthwash is your new best friend. Just remember, it's potent enough to make your teeth the main attraction of your face – so you might want to practice those smile-smirks in the mirror.
